property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)} ■ While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then put the same number of cards as that creature's cost from the top of your deck into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. ► Discard a card from your hand, then draw 2 cards: ► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this spell from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ Draw a card. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, draw a card. {SASAGALE} 1 (While summoning a Dispector, you may reduce its cost by 1. If you do, destroy this creature. That Dispector can't cost less than 0.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ After this creature attacks, destroy this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {POWER ATTACKER} +6000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this card leaves, untap the creature under it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Your opponent chooses one of their creatures and puts it into its owner's mana zone. ■ If you have a creature in the battle zone that has power 6000 or more, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ At the end of your turn, untap this creature. {SASAGALE} 2 (While summoning a Dispector, you may reduce its cost by 2. If you do, destroy this creature. That Dispector can't cost less than 0.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature is put tapped and doesn't untap at the start of your turn. ■ Whenever you cast a spell, untap this creature.
